thread.title: Alan Middleton

author: Alan Middleton
title: Alan Middleton
text:
Booked for fitting today 2 front tyres on my Discovery 3, Phoned in advance to advise when they would arrive. Really amazing customer service and fitting was completed within 30 mins.
Price was really good and cheaper then our local tyre company who normally cannot be beaten on price!
Fitter also notice wheel bearing was not too good and needed replacing which was a great heads up and now off to get that sorted.
Will use in the future!!
